channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Bitbucket Server Integration Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Bitbucket Server Integration Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-28133|2024-08-03T05:48:36.605Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20server%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Server Integration Plugin 3.1.0 and earlier does not limit URL schemes for callback URLs on OAuth consumers, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to create BitBucket Server consumers.

item.title: CVE-2022-28134|2024-08-03T05:48:36.842Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20server%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Server Integration Plugin 3.1.0 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to create, view, and delete BitBucket Server consumers.
